attributes.action: request that Her Majesty the Queen dissolves Parliament and call a General Election before the end of the next parliamentary term
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reputation of the Government is at it lowest point in more than 15 years. Recent scandals of flagrant abuse of the expenses system make the position of the entire House untenable. Let the people decide if the current encumbents are worthy of our trust and vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
